website_summaries.verdict: A basic product that offers numerous benefits without containing a long list of ingredients. A great addition to add to almost any skincare regimen.
pros: Pure maracuja oil that's packed with skin-loving fatty acids and vitamins that are moisturizing for most skin types
Fans rave about it correcting dry, rough patches
Absorbs into the skin quickly without feeling greasy
A few drops go a long way
cons: but has earned many more happy customers than complaints

customer_reviews.title: Not like original formula
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of the Tarte Maracuja oil through a beauty subscription box and fell in love with it and immediately went to repurchase after I ran out. However, after receiving the product and testing it for a week, it didn't feel the same as the sample I received. It had the smell of corn oil and didn't sink into my skin as well as the sample I received. Not sure if I got a bad batch but I'd purchase this again from an authorized retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amira T.

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have a scent really (maybe slightly like sunflower seeds, only for a minute when applying it). It goes on well and doesn’t leave a greasy look. Does wonders for the area around my eyes and cuticles. I’ll continue to buy it. Also, love the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this face oil. The best I have ever tried, I use it daily. People are always telling me how great my skin it! Use it, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: I didnt think I would like using oil on my skin as I have always ...
customer_reviews.text: I didnt think I would like using oil on my skin as I have always assumed that oil causes me to break out but this turned the condition of my skin around and really helped clear up my skin and the price wasn't so bad either
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had a small size Tarte Maracuja oil. I loved using it and also its scent but this time it didn't smell the same!! Idk if they changed the formula or something else but I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Esintii

customer_reviews.title: Hydrates
customer_reviews.text: The face oil I use it at day time, at night and even before makeup. Good for dry and mature skin
customer_reviews.author: Andra R.

customer_reviews.title: Has old smell to it
customer_reviews.text: I love the oil but it does have an "old" smell to it. I wonder if it is new...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. My sister in law loves this oil. She raves about it all the time. She does have nice skin.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while! My face is smoother. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Plaza

customer_reviews.title: This was not the authentic product
customer_reviews.text: The oil had a foul odor to it and the dropper was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Did not come in original packaging
customer_reviews.text: I've never used this product before, but I know it did not come in its original box. There is no way for me to be sure this is an original product, because someone could have easily filled this empty Tarte bottle with a cheaper product. That makes me uneasy.
customer_reviews.author: Spotapus1011

customer_reviews.title: Love it on my aging skin.
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this oil and had to have more. It minimizes lines and softens skin. I dont even need a moisturizer with this product. And it does not leave skin oily. It absorbs amazingly! Will purchase over and over. By the way my aging skin is 62!
customer_reviews.author: Content Giver

customer_reviews.title: My favorite beauty product!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, LOVE this oil. It has an awesome smell and feels so good when I use it. I use it on my face and hair after I get out of the shower. I use it when my hair is still wet so it dries with it. My hair looks and feels healthier and even shines more. It's a bit more expensive than other oils, but a little goes a LONG way and it takes a couple of months for me to run out so it's totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's because I'm a college student but this was expensive for such a small bottle. Don't get me wrong I really enjoy the after effects it has done with my skin on my face! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: perfect skin
customer_reviews.text: This is addictive. I have quit using traditional moisturizer creams and prefer this face oil.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEIR OTHER PRODUCTS ALSO
customer_reviews.text: I USE THIS FAITHFULLY AND HAVE FOR SEVERAL YEARS. I LOVE THEIR OTHER PRODUCTS ALSO
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best serum. It makes my face feel super soft and helps with my dry skin. As I have gotten older (now 50), my skin has become dryer and this helps so much. I cannot live without it. It is better than most serums I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Dorsett

customer_reviews.title: Yasssss
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil. Use it for foundation and everything actually.
customer_reviews.author: Baylee D.

customer_reviews.title: Not real the oils were fake and their were separate ...
customer_reviews.text: Not real the oils were fake and their were separate layers of oil they tried mixing different oils together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my  Cystic Acne!
customer_reviews.text: I get cystic acne and nothing seems to help. I walked into Ulta and asked the associate what I could do to get rid of my cysts on my face. She suggested I used Maraca oil. My reply back to her was "but I have oily skin, won't this make it worse?". she said no. Try it and if you are not happy you can return it. I purchased it and I am on my 3rd bottle!!! My cystic acne went away within 3-4 days! I noticed such a huge difference...i love this oil. it also helped clean up regular acne.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Manzo

product_meta.title: Tarte Cosmetics Maracuja Oil .5 Ounce Bottle
